name: Bunnelby
author: Hitoshi Ariga
flavor_text: It has ears like shovels. Digging holes strengthens its ears so much that they can sever thick roots effortlessly.

ancient_trait.name: Ω  Barrage
ancient_trait.effect: This Pokémon may attack twice a turn. (If the first attack Knocks Out your opponent’s Active Pokémon, you may attack again after your opponent chooses a new Active Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Burrow
attacks.effect: Discard the top card of your opponent’s deck.

attacks.name: Rototiller
attacks.effect: Shuffle a card from your discard pile into your deck.
